location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'ROAD MAP PRESENT OPERATIONS PROVINCE OF HASA SAUDI ARABIA'

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: Printed on paperDimensions: 590 x 525mm, on sheet 637 x 549mm

mods.abstract: The map shows the Hasa [Al Hasa] region of Saudi Arabia. The map indicates regions, boundaries, settlements, water wells, primary roads, secondary roads, and tertiary roads or camel routes.The map was printed by the California Arabian Standard Oil Company's Producing Department (Geological Division).
